Quick search

Module: crosscal_plots¶

This module contains functionality to create a number of plots from cross-calibration.

Reference¶

class crosscal.crosscal_plots.AutocorrData(scan, fluxcal, trigger_mode, basedir=None)[source]¶

Class for extracting and plotting autocorrelation amplitude.

plot_autocorr_per_antenna(imagepath=None)[source]¶

Plot the autocorrelation for each antenna for all beams

plot_autocorr_per_beam(imagepath=None)[source]¶

Plot the autocorrelation for each beam with all antennas

class crosscal.crosscal_plots.BPSols(scan, fluxcal, trigger_mode, basedir=None)[source]¶

Class for extracting and plotting the bandpass solutions

plot_amp(imagepath=None)[source]¶

Plot amplitude, one plot per antenna

plot_phase(imagepath=None)[source]¶

Plot phase, one plot per antenna

class crosscal.crosscal_plots.CorrectedData(scan, fluxcal, trigger_mode, basedir=None)[source]¶

Class for extracting and plotting the baseline-averaged corrected data

class crosscal.crosscal_plots.GDSols(scan, fluxcal, trigger_mode, basedir=None)[source]¶

Class for extracting and plotting the global delay

plot_delay(imagepath=None)[source]¶

Plot amplitude, one plot per antenna

plot_dish_delay(imagepath=None)[source]¶

Plot global delays, dish-based views

class crosscal.crosscal_plots.GainSols(scan, fluxcal, trigger_mode, basedir=None)[source]¶

class crosscal.crosscal_plots.KCrossSols(scan, polcal, trigger_mode, basedir=None)[source]¶

class crosscal.crosscal_plots.RawData(scan, fluxcal, trigger_mode, basedir=None)[source]¶

Class for extracting and plotting the baseline-averaged raw data.

crosscal.crosscal_plots.make_all_ccal_plots(scan, fluxcal, polcal, output_path=None, basedir=None, trigger_mode=False)[source]¶

Create crosscal QA plots

Args:
scan (int): Task id of target, e.g. 190311152
fluxcal (str): Name of fluxcal, e.g. “3C147”
polcal(str): Name of the polcal, e.g. “3C286”
output_path (str): Output path, None for default
trigger_mode (bool): To run automatically after Apercal
